message.content:
cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.DM, cs.CC, cs.GT. 

The paper deals with the art gallery problem, which is a fundamental problem in computational geometry. Therefore, cs.CG (Computational Geometry) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves constructing polygons with integer coordinates, which suggests that it could belong to cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) or cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics). The use of optimization techniques and the study of the number of guards needed for a polygon suggest that it could also belong to cs.CC (Computational Complexity) or cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory).
